import React from 'react' import {useNavigate} from "react-router-dom"; import {Container,Button} from "react-bootstrap" import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; //import logo from "../../public/logo.png"; //import logo2 from "../../public/logo2.png" import step1 from "../Assets/Vector.png" function Description() { const navigate = useNavigate() return (

Tumor Annotation task

Task Description

In this task, you are going to detect and annotate tumor in ten different images.

Task Guideliness

  • Please answer all the questions asked in the next section
  • Watch the Tutorial to learn to identify tumor
  • Follow the drawing instructions according to the tutorial
  • Please do not skip if you have not fully understood the task
  • On mouse left click , start drawing and finish on mouse u
  • You can always click on help icon durring the task
  • Complete all the images to recieve your payment reward

Interface Instructions

  • Press left mouse click to start drawing on the image
  • Press delete button to redraw
  • Press save button for each annotated image
  • For help click the help button above
) } export default Description
